00086                                                             {
00087         // log-scaled population density
00088         LatLonGrid popdensity = GlobalPopulation.read(GlobalPopulation.NORTHAMERICA, new GlobalPopulation.LogScaling());
00089         popdensity = popdensity.crop(900, 2500, 200, 200);
00090         File out = OutputDirectory.getDefault("localstat");
00091 
00092         KmlWriter.write(popdensity, out, "popdensity", PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00093         for (int neigh = 5; neigh < 12; neigh += 6){ // 5, 11
00094             LocalMeasures stat = new LocalMeasures(popdensity, neigh, neigh);
00095             KmlWriter.write(stat.getMean(), out, "mean_" + neigh, PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00096             KmlWriter.write(stat.getStdDeviation(), out, "stdev_" + neigh, PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00097             KmlWriter.write(stat.getMin(), out, "min_" + neigh, PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00098             KmlWriter.write(stat.getMax(), out, "max_" + neigh, PngWriter.createCoolToWarmColormap());
00099         }
